name: Gorilla vs Robots
description:
A mother gorilla who is looking for her daughter. The mother gorilla has to find her kidnaped daughter. The woods are big and the gorilla has to walk a lot. In the wood, the mother gorilla has to fight all the enemies in order to reach her daughter. There are more enemies every time the mother gorilla is getting closer to her daughter. A the end, there will be a huge robot enemy where the forillia has to fight in order to get her daughter. Will you be ave to help the mother gorilla fer to her daughter safely before the time runs out and the baby gorilla dies?

Use W and S to go forward and backward, use the mouse to navigate around, click on the left mouse to hit
